title: Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park: Passport Book
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Passport Book              Passport Book          We invite you to take your park Passport Book and explore the Blackstone River Valley. As you visit the different areas of the park, you will learn about the beginnings of industry in America, walk through the historic mill villages that still make up the backbone of the region, and take advantage of the recreational opportunities offered by the Blackstone River. The pages of this Passport Book have a space to stamp or “cancel” the date and location of your visit to each of the areas in the park.  After you have collected all of the stamps, present your completed Passport Book to a Park Ranger a to celebrate your achievement. The cancellation stamps will be available at at least one spot in each park area and our Park Rangers will also have the stamp of each location where they are as they travel around the Blackstone River Valley. Please feel free to share and celebrate your progress on social media using #nps6for6.
